summary:
Graag zou ik mezelf willen typeren als iemand die sociaal in de omgang is. Ik ben zowel een denker als een doener en beschik over een dienstverlenend karakter. Andere persoonlijke eigenschappen van mij zijn: Een zorgvuldige en kritische werkhouding, een goede wil om te presteren. Ik ben leergierig en heb de ambitie om verder te groeien.

Gedurende de opleidingen “Netwerkbeheerder” en “Bedrijfskundige Informatica” heb ik veel ervaring opgedaan m.b.t.: communicatie, observeren, analyseren, adviseren, processen, kennis overdragen op gebruikersniveau zowel mondeling als schriftelijk, projectmanagement, plannen, klantgerichtheid en innovatie. Deze eigenschappen heb ik in de loop der tijd verder ontwikkeld. 

Tevens beschik ik over goede communicatieve vaardigheden en stressbestendigheid. Verder ben ik erg flexibel en kan ik zowel zelfstandig als in teamverband werken.

education.field_of_study: Innovation and Management of Information Systems (IBIS)

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Power Platform App Maker Associate (PL-100)
MS 70-480 Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3

projects.title: VGZ all-round Office 365 specialist for migration process
projects.description:
VGZ needed an all-round Office 365 specialist to guide and support their migration process. This to transfer their current data, which consisted of approximately 2800 SharePoint 2010 sites and 180 Shared drives with a total of 60 TB of data. The data in question is used by 3400 users in the care peak period. So information need to be migrated in the right period for the different departments.

Mark was mainly hired to speed up the migration process with his knowledge and experience. This involved holding intakes with the relevant representative of the department. During this intake, agreements are made and recorded regarding: cleaning and mapping of the data. After which in most cases a training took place and finally the migration with ShareGate. After the migration there was 1 month support after which the site and / or department disk was removed. In addition to these tasks, Mark was involved with general training and other issues within the Office 365 team.

Methods and technologies: Teams, Flow, PowerApps, Planner, SharePoint Online, SharePoint 2010, FileShares, ShareGate, SharePoint Designer, PowerShell, Microsoft Office, SCRUM, Azure DevOps

projects.title: Ordina internal migration and adoption of Teams and SharePoint
projects.description:
Within Ordina a part of the FileShares (P-drive) and the SharePoint 2010 environment will be migrated to Microsoft Teams. This process consists of an adoption and migration part.

Mark took care of a number of tasks: drafting a migration strategy, executing migrations from FileShares and SharePoint workspaces, placing relevant news messages (training and tips), communicating and unburdening owners.

Methods and technologies: Office 365, SharePoint Online, SharePoint 2010, ShareGate, PowerShell, Microsoft Office, SCRUM

projects.title: RWS-Content Management (Migration)
projects.description:
The new RCM program based on aims to realize previously planned benefits, with extra attention on improving collaboration and knowledge sharing. All employees work after the rollout with one document management system (Microsoft Teams / Office 365), this makes it easier to create, share, collaborate, archive and retrieve documents. The RCM program consists of several teams such as the migration. The migration consists of three parts: FileShares, SharePoint and eDocs.

Mark was responsible for the phasing out of the SharePoint environments (2007, 2010, 2013 and 2013 PLA) and eDocs. Some of his tasks: writing a project plan (SharePoint migration), analyzing the SharePoint-environments, package (pre) selection for eDocs migration, additional advisory role for other teams within the project.

Methods and technologies: Office 365, SharePoint (Online, 2013, 2010 and 2007), SharePoint Designer, InfoPath, ShareGate, AvePoint Discovery, PowerShell, Axceler ControlPoint, Microsoft Office

projects.title: Lighting Migration Finance and Procurement
projects.description:
In early 2017, the Finance and Procurement SharePoint site collections from Royal Philips would be migrated to Philips Lighting. On that moment there was no time from the business, but now they had to because the Lighting users would lose their permissions on the Royal Philips environments.

Mark started with migrating a couple of site collections with ShareGate. Than he was assigned to redesign and build a complete site collections, because it was built with specific Access functionality in SharePoint. This functionality would no longer be supported on the Office 365 platform after May 2018.

Methods and technologies: Office 365, SharePoint Online, SharePoint Designer 2013, InfoPath 2013, ShareGate, Microsoft Office, SCRUM

projects.title: SharePoint L2 Support Atos Poland team for Philips
projects.description:
After the Philips Aftercare project there remaining outstanding ticket where transferred to the Atos Poland team. Unfortunately, the backlog reached a certain point and they needed people who could help them and had already knowledge about the processes within Royal Philips.

The following tasks fulfilled Mark:
- Solving tickets and looking for the underlying problem
- Ensure generic solutions and thereby create work instructions
- Being a contact person for such complicated tickets to work with Microsoft (L3 support)

Methods and technologies: Office 365, SharePoint Online, SharePoint Designer 2013, InfoPath 2013, ShareGate, Microsoft Office

projects.title: Philips Drachten SharePoint Support
projects.description:
Philips Drachten needed help to restructure a couple of their site collection. This based on an ad hoc way of working because of the availability. 

Mark advised them on how to restructure the content and how to implement and use new functionality. After that he restructured the content with ShareGate and improved some existing functionalities (such as: web parts and layout on pages). 

Methods and technologies: Office 365, SharePoint Online, SharePoint Designer 2013, ShareGate

projects.title: Philips SharePoint Aftercare
projects.description:
Microsoft moved the underlaying database from SharePoint 2013 to their new O365 environment. This caused a number of ‘known’ migration issues and a lot of questions regarding the new functionalities and look and feel.

The mean goal was to solve as many as possible tickets in a short period and if needed to work with Microsoft. Tickets could vary from ‘known’ migration issues to questions regarding interface and new functionality. 

Methods and technologies: Office 365, SharePoint (2013 and Online), SharePoint Designer 2013, InfoPath 2013

projects.title: POC eLibrary ATNS
projects.description:
The local Atos team created a proposition for the ATNS in South Africa. On that moment they needed a person that could do the following: review their proposed solution, create a POC environment based on the proposition and give the demo with substantive knowledge.

In this assignment Mark reviewed and improved the proposed solution. Based on that he created a POC environment and gave a presentation to the stakeholders of ATNS and later that month for the CEO of ATNS.

Methods and technologies: Office 365, SharePoint (2013 and Online), SharePoint Designer 2013

projects.title: Philips SharePoint 2013 migration/upgrade to the Cloud
projects.description:
The Gemini project was needed for the final split and migration/upgrade to the cloud for both companies with their SharePoint environment. For Philips Lighting, Microsoft migrated their Site Collection to their Office 365 environment in a couple of migration waves. For Royal Philips the whole database will be 'moved' to the cloud. 

For Philips Lighting the migration by Microsoft caused a number of issues for a couple of their Site Collection. These issues needed to be fixed for these Site Collection and their for Atos was hired.

Methods and technologies: MS SharePoint 2013 and O365, MS SharePoint Designer 2013, Metalogix, Azure

projects.title: Philips Lighting remainder migration of SP 2007
projects.description:
During the Gemini migration and split there where a number of 2007 SharePoint Site Collections and a 2010 SC classified as to ignore. Later turned out that these Site Collection where important for the business. These SC needed to be migrated directly into the Office 365 environment of Philips Lighting.

Tasks for Mark:
- Archiving site collections (with readable InfoPath forms) 
- Creating the user mapping (for the Office 365 environment)
- Recreating the same functionalities of the legacy environments (without Nintex functionalities) 

Methods and technologies: MS SharePoint 2007, 2010 and O365, MS SharePoint Designer 2007 and 2013, Metalogix, Nintex Workflows

projects.title: Siemens SharePoint Migration
projects.description:
Soon the SharePoint 2007 farms are no longer supported, therefore Siemens would like to migrate everything to different SharePoint 2013 Farms. The India Atos migration factory was hired for the migration but they needed some help from the Dutch SharePoint team.

Mark had different tasks within this project: 
- Optimize the migration process with Metalogix (Analyze and improve) 
- Establishment of the Intense User Support with the SPARK tooling 
- Lead for the SharePoint Designer workflow migration 

Methods and technologies: MS SharePoint 2007 en 2013, MS SharePoint Designer 2007 en 2013, Metalogix, Nintex Workflows, SPARK

projects.title: Philips Gemini - (Migration and Split)
projects.description:
Philips divided into two organization earlier this year: Royal Philips and Philips Lighting. There for the applications needed to be duplicated and moved, from 'SP 2007 and 2010' to their SharePoint 2013 Dedicated environment.

My focus was on stream 2: archiving or creating the same functionalities of the legacy environments  on the SharePoint Online environment. With a remark that Nintex workflows and forms needed to be removed, because this was no longer available on the Online environment. So everything needed to be build with SharePoint Designer workflows and InfoPath forms.

Methods and techniques: 
MS SharePoint 2007, 2010 and 2013, MS SharePoint Designer 2007 and 2013, MS InfoPath Designer 2013, Nintex Workflows, MS Azure, MS Application Insight, Metalogix, SCRUM, Rally

projects.title: Philips IP&S -Standardization Web
projects.description:
Within Philips IP&S they use an application for managing: Standards, Regulations and other information for their users. This application (Standardization Web) came to a disposal status because of a burning platform. Therefore the application must fit in the Philips architecture and offer some new features.

Methods and technologies:
MS SharePoint 2013, MS SharePoint O365, MS Visual Studio 2013, MS SharePoint Designer 2013, SCRUM, Rally

projects.title: Workshop - Social Collaboration in Word 2016 on the InnovAtos Plaza
projects.description:
Workshop about the functionality real-time co-authoring in Office 2016. This is applicable for: Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote. In several sessions for Atos employees and customers at the following locations:
- Amstelveen (NL)
- Groningen (NL)

projects.title: Presenting SharePoint on the Competence Plaza
projects.description:
Presenting an approachable SharePoint overview with some corny examples, for Atos employees and customers. In several sessions at the following locations:
- Utrecht (NL)
- Groningen (NL)
- Zaventem (BE)

projects.title: MyHR Portal BTN
projects.description:
This is a HR Portal for the BTN (Benelux and the Nordics). Here you can find all documents about HR matters, a possibility to report yourself sick, various automated forms and this all for different user roles.

Design and manage; forms, workflows, web parts, users, groups, search, documents, interfaces, scripts, styling, and more.

Methods and techniques: 
MS SharePoint 2010 and 2013, MS SharePoint Designer 2010 and 2013, MS InfoPath Designer 2010 and 2013, CSS, HTML, Javascript, Team Foundation Server

projects.title: Atos In A Box SharePoint Migration
projects.description:
Made an analyze to find out the standard and custom features of a couple site collections (of Atos customers). After my analyze delivered a report to the migration specialist.

Methods and techniques: 
MS SharePoint 2007, MS SharePoint Designer 2007

projects.title: POC Supporter 2.0
projects.description:
Proof of Concepts developed for a new environment where thousands of documents are stored. Because the information model behind this website is outdated and the layout is not of this time.

Methods and techniques: 
MS SharePoint 2010 and 2013, MS SharePoint Designer 2010 and 2013, MS InfoPath Designer 2010, CSS, HTML, Javascript
